page.title: 02A Turkey Farm near Huntley
page.content: Mote Farm is a turkey farm in the Huntley area and the farmhouse is old for it was built in the 14th Century.A small part still has wattle and daub walls. The farm is now owned by Mr.and Mrs.House who have been in the turkey business for eighteen years but they have only lived at Mote Farm for eight years. They keep over 14,000 turkeys on the farm each year. When the turkeys are about one week old they are kept in a large shed in a heat of 27 degrees C. At Christmas the need for turkeys is much higher and about 10,000 turkeys are sold from Mote Farm. 1985 could be a very good year for turkey farmers because there are not so many turkeys around and the prices are higher.
